column5: Trying to plan dates for next spring. Does anyone know for sure when the fishing season opens at Lac Seul in May of 2016?
It would be may 21st for walleye opener.
Opener always falls on the 3 rd Saturday of may.

NE Piker,If you just want to fish for Northern Pike (I believe you are a Pike enthusiast) they are open year round. Walleye season opens the 3rd Saturday.You could avoid some highway and lake traffic by going up early.
Might have to bring an ice auger though.

Possibly, but:This year Walleye Opener was May 16thNext year Walleye Opener is May 21stSo, going up a week before Walleye Opener is just 2 calendar days earlier next year than this year.All depends on when spring arrives on Lac Seul.
